snippet: “Nashville” is too much movie for your TV, so you might want to obey the Museum of the Moving Image’s sweetly coercive injunction to “See It Big!”
lead_paragraph: “Nashville” is too much movie for your TV, so you might want to obey the Museum of the Moving Image’s sweetly coercive injunction to “See It Big!”

headline.main: A Grand Ole Opus From Altman
